participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and optimistic, Emily enjoys exploring new experiences and values her independence.
participant_1.background: I live in my hometown right now, but I'm planning to move to Australia in the future. I love to create spooky decorations for Halloween. I need a place where I can practice my guitar without disturbing the neighbors. I'm counting down the days to retirement and enjoying my singing time in the shower.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Energetic and family-oriented, Jason finds joy in his work and values the connections he has with loved ones.
participant_2.background: After a long day of creating websites, I like to go for a run to clear my head. I watch Rick and Morty when my parents are not home because they don't approve of it. I remember feeling safe and loved when my mom would take me to the park. I enjoy spending time with my family as they help me stay grounded and connected to my roots. I love spending time with my pets and they bring me so much joy.

content.text: Hi there! I'm doing well today, thanks for asking. I'm planning to move to Australia in the future, how about you?
Hi! I'm doing well too. That's exciting, why are you planning to move to Australia?
I've always wanted to live in a different country and I think Australia would be a great place to start. I love the beach and the weather there.
That's awesome! I love the beach too. I've never been to Australia, but it sounds like a beautiful place.
It is! I'm really looking forward to moving there.
I'm sure you'll love it. What do you do for work?
I work from home as a web designer. It's great because I can work from anywhere, but I do miss going into the office sometimes.
That sounds like a great job! I'm a web designer too, but I work in an office. I like the social aspect of working in an office, but I can see how it would be nice to work from home sometimes.
Yeah, I like that I can set my own hours and work in my pajamas, but I miss the interaction with other people.
I totally get that. Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have two dogs. They're my best friends.
That's awesome! I love dogs. I have a cat.
